languages.text: {n}Паскаль задумчиво касается раскола, пересекающего броню его респиратора. Зеленая искра бежит в глубинах проломленного оружием врага металла.{/n}
{n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль задумчиво касается раскола, пересекающего броню его респиратора. Зеленая искра бежит в глубинах проломленного оружием врага металла.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは考え込んでいる様子で、身につけた呼吸器に走るひびに触れる。敵の武器によって刻まれた、金属部分の深い溝から緑の火花が漏れていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは考え込んでいる様子で、身につけた呼吸器に走るひびに触れる。敵の武器によって刻まれた、金属部分の深い溝から緑の火花が漏れていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看上去若有所思。他正摸着呼吸器上的裂缝，那是敌人的武器在金属上留下的深深伤口。此时，一串绿色的火花从裂缝中掠过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看上去若有所思。他正摸着呼吸器上的裂缝，那是敌人的武器在金属上留下的深深伤口。此时，一串绿色的火花从裂缝中掠过。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'air pensif, Pasqal effleure la fissure qui lézarde son respirateur. Un éclair vert court le long de l'entaille, probablement causée par l'arme d'un ennemi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air pensif, Pasqal effleure la fissure qui lézarde son respirateur. Un éclair vert court le long de l'entaille, probablement causée par l'arme d'un ennemi.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal parece pensativo mientras toca la grieta que le recorre el respirador blindado. Un destello verde ilumina el profundo tajo producido por el arma de un enemigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal parece pensativo mientras toca la grieta que le recorre el respirador blindado. Un destello verde ilumina el profundo tajo producido por el arma de un enemigo.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal berührt nachdenklich den Riss, der sich durch seinen gepanzerten Respirator zieht. Ein grüner Funke läuft den tiefen Schlitz entlang, den die Waffe eines Feindes im Metall hinterlassen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal berührt nachdenklich den Riss, der sich durch seinen gepanzerten Respirator zieht. Ein grüner Funke läuft den tiefen Schlitz entlang, den die Waffe eines Feindes im Metall hinterlassen hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zırhlı solunum maskesindeki çatlağa dokunan Pasqal, düşünceli görünüyor. Düşman silahının metalde bıraktığı derin kesikte yeşil bir kıvılcım çakılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks thoughtful as he touches the crack running across his armoured respirator. A green spark runs through the deep gash left by an enemy's weapon in the metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zırhlı solunum maskesindeki çatlağa dokunan Pasqal düşünceli görünüyor. Düşman silahının metalde bıraktığı derin kesikte yeşil bir kıvılcım oluşuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
